channel.title: CPanel on Spidey Blogs
channel.description: Recent content in CPanel on Spidey Blogs

item.title: How to Connect Email of cPanel to an Email Client
item.description: A step-by-step guide on how to connect your cPanel email account to an email client.

item.title: How to add addon Domain in cPanel
item.description: This guide will walk you through the steps to set up an addon domain in cPanel

item.title: How to change php version in cPanel using .htaccess
item.description: Changing the PHP version for your website can be necessary for compatibility with different scripts or for leveraging new features. In this guide, we’ll show you how to change the PHP version using the .htaccess file in cPanel.

item.title: How to install wordpress in cPanel
item.description: cPanel is a popular control panel for managing web hosting. This guide will walk you through the process of installing WordPress via cPanel.
